summary:
This mod basically activates more weapon slots by overwriting the ini value \"bDisableGearedUp\" and 
provides script functionality to prevent the glitches associated with it.
descriptionHtml:
PLEASE READ:
This mod isn\'t working as intended and basically dead. I just made it visible again for another modder. Feel free to try it but don\'t expect any updates for it.

This mod basically activates more weapon slots by overwriting the ini value \"bDisableGearedUp\".
The problem with this option usually is that many glitches can appear.

However, I wrote a script to make it work, kind of. 
It\'s not perfect but it\'s working most of the time.

If you mostly use different weapons of different types this should work for you.
But it seems like I have to add some more code for shields and magic.
I\'m still figuring out different things.

EDIT:
I just realized this only works intended if you have equipped a shield all the time.
I\'m currently looking into this.

Requires:
- SKSE 1.6.15 or higher -> http://skse.silverlock.org/
author: grasmann
